author: cnbc.com
title: BankUnited, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
MIAMI LAKES, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- BankUnited, Inc. (NYSE:BKU) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.21 per common share. The dividend will be payable on April 30, 2018 to stockholders of record at the close of business on April 12, 2018.
About BankUnited, Inc.
BankUnited, Inc. is the bank holding company of BankUnited, N.A., a national bank headquartered in Miami Lakes, Florida with 87 branches in 15 Florida counties and six banking centers in the New York metropolitan area.
